content:
Craft an item of type: stone_slab
inventory=[{"type": "infested_chiseled_stone_bricks", "quantity": 15, "index": 16}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete", "quantity": 28, "index": 18}, {"type": "wheat", "quantity": 61, "index": 23}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 17, "index": 34}, {"type": "dragon_egg", "quantity": 9, "index": 36}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 3, "index": 37}, {"type": "polished_andesite_slab", "quantity": 43, "index": 41}, {"type": "grass_block", "quantity": 6, "index": 42}, {"type": "golden_apple", "quantity": 26, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft stone_slabs, I need to first craft stones. Stones are crafted from cobblestones, therefore I will smelt the cobblestone in slot 37 into an empty slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 37 to slot 11 with quantity 1

thought: Now that I have enough stones, I can start crafting the stone slabs. Stone slabs require placing 3 stones in a row in the crafting grid, therefore I will start by moving the stone in slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 2 with quantity 1
